pgrid
Class PGridHost

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.Host
      pgrid.PGridHost
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable, Peer
public class PGridHost
extends Host
implements Peer, Comparable

This class represents a host of the P-Grid Network.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Roman Schmidt

getKeyRange

public KeyRange getKeyRange()
Get the range for which the peer is responsible. Due to the structure of P-Grid, giving a range does not make sens. To be compliant with the basic Interface, a key range is constructed with a lower bound and higher bound that are equal.

Specified by:
getKeyRange in interface Peer
Returns:
the KeyRange
